excerpt.rendered:
From an American Oak Sherry Puncheon, this Exceptional Single Cask from The Macallan is the 2019, cask 4 ( #6355). This is vintage 2001, aged for 17 years and finally bottled at 50.8%. This american oak version promises sweet honey notes and raisins.

ESC 2019/ESB-14/03
Cask Type: American Oak Sherry Puncheon
Distilled: 24 October 2001
Bottled: 2 September 2019
One of 576 bottles

Cask number #6355

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 17
Vintage : 2001
ABV : 50.80%
